#include<iostream>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
ll gcd(ll a, ll b)
{
	while(b>0)
	{
		ll c=a%b;
		a=b;
		b=c;
	}
	return a;
}
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n,m;
		cin>>n>>m;
		ll num=(n/2)*((m+1)/2) + (m/2)*((n+1)/2);
		ll den=n*m;
		ll x=gcd(num,den);
		 num=num/x;
         den=den/x;
         cout<<num<<"/"<<den<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
